body: Why are there 38 "different" issues of this same book? Is it the doujinshi version of spamming? And how is it that not one that I've skimmed through is a pure artbook version? The artwork is great, but I have no clue as to the context since I don't speak Chinese! So there should be a version with just the art. Also, how come this hasn't been translated yet?
Don't judge a hentai by it's cover.......fucking hell I always ignored this because of it's cover and how bad it looks
SOMEONE HAS TO TRANSLATE THIS! IT'S FRIKING GOLD!
chinks need to permanently change the cover.
Well, the years keep coming and they don't stop coming.
